outlines.title: Data and Analytics - Local Partnerships
h2: The Data and Analytics Team in provides data driven insight, tools and capability for our public sector clients.

Our team combines data analytical expertise with deep sector knowledge to help you get the insight required to make better decisions. Whether it’s social care, commercial services, net zero, housing, or anything else, we can help.

We develop clear and insightful dashboards and data applications to help you understand what really matters. Using the latest technology, we help you and your team interact with your data, wherever it is based.

We help you accelerate your data ambitions by working with you to understand any gaps in organisational capacity and capability, help develop a coherent strategy that addresses the issues and prioritise work that really matters.
